channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drains blocked and water running down the lane eroding the road surface, 21st November
item.description:
Drain near the top of the lane is blocked and water runs down the road bypassing drains further down the road. The road surface is very badly eroded with the running water.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Lane, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect signage, 21st November
item.description:
Sign showing cycles permitted in bus lane. There is a newly constructed dedicated cycle lane for cycles adjacent to the bus lane. Failure to update signage to reflect change to highway. Why are motorcycles not permitted to use this particular section of bus lane where elsewhere they are?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 21st November
item.description:
email rec 17/11/2023 My wife and I I moved into 56 Wellbrook Road, Bishops Cleeve . GL52 8BW two years ago . At the back of the property there is a brook . On the part of the bank nearest to our house we have discovered a Bamboo Tree which is sending runners into the garden . We have contacted Tewksbury Borough Council , to whom we pay Council Tax , and they inform us that G.C.C are responsible for the tree line on the brook . If this is correct we would request the removal of the tree as the runners are invasive . Could you please clarify this situation.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large stones and lots of soil deposited opposite drive by the home owner to block a passing place opposite drive, 21st November
item.description:
Large stones and lots of soil deposited opposite drive by the home owner to block a passing place opposite drive. The other passing places up the road are damaging the bottoms of cars as they are so deep to pull over. The pull over opposite the house drive after blacklaines but before Longdole where a bollard was placed need to be looked at at this has been for the last 40 years a pull over and the homeowner has gradually dumped so much soil and stones to stop people being able to pass safely and if you look on google maps from previously you can see what I mean so I believe that this should be reinstated as it was and the homeowner should remove all of the soil that they dumped on it over the last 2 years to prevent a safe passing place. Please report to this to the relevant authority if this is the wrong place. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged access panel. Believe it may well be Severn Trent., 21st November
item.description:
Damaged access panel. Loud banging noise when driven over - which happens multiple times per hour, day and night. First reported 10/8/23 - DMC001049 / 11430937. Nothing has happened as yet - at some point it will fail completely, and become a major problem, you would assume.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmead Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on Lobleys bridge in direction from Abbeymead to Cooper's Edge, 21st November
item.description:
Pot hole on the roadway on Lobleys bridge in direction of travel from Abbeymead to Cooper's Edge. Road is breaking up and pothole will only get worse in the coming days. This keeps happening on the bridge despite it being resurfaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
